Resource.name: jdbc.database
Resource.description: JDBC database connection config as a DataSource resource

Parameter.name: shibboleth.metadata.url
Parameter.description: absolute URL to Shibboleth metadata file; either file:///, localhost, or using SSL

Parameter.name: shibboleth.storageservice.prefixes
Parameter.description: space-separated list of StorageService(s) prefixes used in target= parameters; almost always 'ss:mem:'

Parameter.name: shibboleth.default.target
Parameter.description: default URL to visit after login if none given; empty to return an error message in that case

Parameter.name: shibboleth.default.login
Parameter.description: default URL to /Shibboleth.sso/Login, used if none given; empty to return an error

Parameter.name: discovery.web.root
Parameter.description: root URL of servlet, usually absolute

Parameter.name: discovery.friendly.idps
Parameter.description: number of IdPs to show in the 'friendly' discovery

Parameter.name: discovery.friendly.others
Parameter.description: text to show on the 'other IdPs' button; can contain HTML
